title: Manage a Transaction Checklist
description: For a new property under contract, an agent needs to use a transaction checklist to ensure all tasks and deadlines are met.

tasks.description: Apply a standard 'Buyer Side' transaction checklist template to the new transaction.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates a new checklist for the property.

tasks.description: Enter the key dates from the contract (e.g., effective date, contingency deadlines, closing date) into the checklist.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately populates the checklist with all critical deadlines.

tasks.description: As tasks are completed (e.g., 'Earnest Money Deposited'), mark them as done in the system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent keeps the checklist updated in real-time throughout the transaction.
